add_lag_features[source]

add_lag_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, lag_periods=[1])

Helper function that adds lag features relevant to the column field_name of df.

add_moving_average_features[source]

add_moving_average_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, windows=[3], weighted=True)
